args: You...you monster! After all we did to\neliminate the barriers between races!\nHOW COULD YOU?!
Cease your feeble attempts to resist.\nSeize hold your fate. Perish.
＂Luca＂? An accursed name.\nThe moniker of he who blighted\nthis land fallow with weakness.
*pant* *pant* When I heard\nthe village was under attack,\nI ran here as quickly as I could!
The homes... The fields... They're gone.\nAnd after how hard you all worked to\nbuild this village!
Luca: The name of the very fool who\ndreamed this absurd hamlet into being.
Who the hell are YOU, man?\nDid you do this?! Where is everyone?!
I am Kai Yan. I am the apex. I am he\nwho would show the correct path\nto all who pervade this land.
This town was befouled with weakness.\nThus did I take it upon myself to raze it to\nthe ground and annihilate its populace.

The weak are culled by the strong.
Thus is the foundation of this world.
Given that, what are the people here?
They are frail. Feeble. ...Weak.
Those who forsake factional competition to\nwallow in the fetid cesspool of harmony\nhave forgotten what it means to be strong.
One differs so one may fight and kill\nand persecute until but a single\nspecies is left standing.
Only the last surviving species will prove\nitself worthy of inheriting this world.\nThus does evolution wield the scythe.

That, Luca, is why the village you built
is a mockery. A burlesque. You were a
jester who gamboled and pranced as you
led these people down damnation's path.

And if I am to direct the other species
of this world back to the path of right,
you must meet the same fate as those
fool enough to follow you!

Only then will the different peoples of
this world resume their rightful strife!
Only then will this travesty be properly
expunged from both memory and mind!
That's a load of crap! And what about the\nfact that not a single person here wanted\nanything to DO with your sick plan?!
You, Luca, may have eschewed my design.\nBut the others? No. I doubt it.

This land teems with canaille—the Empire
not least among them. In your absence,
could they not have put this village to
the sword at their leisure?

What gospel did you evangelize to these
dotards as they teetered on the precipice?
That they may remain weak? That all they
needed was to live in mindless harmony?

So long as you were there to protect them,
perhaps. But were they ever truly safe?
Look around you! Feast your eyes!
Then tell me that it was ever so!
You're just coming up with justifications\nfor the fact that you hate seeing people of\ndifferent backgrounds come together!

And yeah, I get it—there's no end of
fighting in Alberia. That's how all the
people in this village lost their homes,
their families, and their friends.
But they had to keep on livin', and that's\nwhy we all came together in this place.

I don't know if that's a rightful path or
a ＂damnable＂ one, and I don't care.
It's a path we chose, and you ruined it—
and I'll NEVER forgive you for it!

And I shall grant no absolution for you
fostering weakness as you lead others
down a path filled with ruin and lies—
so by my hand you will pay for it!
There must be culling! Culling! CULLING!\nOnly from violence can true strength\nand prosperity be born!
O power universal! Peerless might and\nhoned force, imbue my body with\ndauntless strength!
I have fused my flesh with the Vajra Orb,\na relic of untold power! My body, already\nultimate, has ascended to a new plane!
He fused a Qilin relic into his body?!
We are the invincible arm that rules\nover all species. We are...AGITO!
Behold—my perfect form!\nMy peerless might!\nI am DAUNTLESS!
